name: Resource Monitor
short_description: Some VPSs restart when a threshold of resource usage is exceeded, with this tool you will be able to monitor any abnormal resource usage.

params.title: Resource Monitor x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Seconds To Check
params.content: The interval in seconds of the resource control

params.title: Trigger (%)
params.content: The percentage above which notification is triggered

params.title: Reset (%)
params.content: After the notification if it goes back this value resets the trigger and prepares for a new notification

params.title: Enabled?
params.content: Enable sending notifications, be careful to enter correct values in the following parameters

params.title: API
params.content: The url of the API service you want to send notifications to.

params.title: POST params
params.content: The information you want to send to the API service

params.title: Color
params.content: The color of the banner text

params.title: Vertical Position
params.content: The vertical position of the banner

params.title: Horizontal Position
params.content: The horizontal position of the banner
